content: this is an easy half a granny shape that will form a triangular shawl it is started at the top and you can use any yarn with any hook and in any gauge and make the shawl to any size as such it s great for both stash busting and for charity this shawl was formerly known as the alpaca shawl if you have any questions or comments or just want to join like-minded souls please join my ravelry group at http //www ravelry com/groups/anastacia-knits-designs thanks
